parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the value, but you must make sure that it is unique among different requests. The client token can contain only ASCII characters.

>  If you do not set this parameter, the system uses **RequestId** as **ClientToken**. **RequestId** may be different for each API request.

parameters.name: QosId
parameters.description: The ID of the QoS policy.

parameters.name: QueueId
parameters.description: The ID of the QoS queue.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the QoS policy.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: RuleIdList
parameters.description: The list of QoS rule IDs.

parameters.name: RuleNameList
parameters.description: The list of QoS rule names.
